Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average time between Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER and Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time it takes Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER to be executed after Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Total time spent in Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time between Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE and Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in successful variants ending with Payment Handled
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average duration of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER compared to Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Average time from Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER to Request Payment in variants where no rejections occur
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Total cycle time of cases containing Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER, measured from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Payment Handled
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum time between Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER and Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in high-frequency variants (frequency > 100)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average waiting time before Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER is performed after Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average time between Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER and the subsequent Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in rework loops
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Total elapsed time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Payment Handled in variants that include Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER versus those that include Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time from Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER to Payment Handled in domestic reimbursement claims
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average duration of the segment Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE → Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER → Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR compared to the segment Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE → Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION → Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Minimum resolution time of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in cases processed entirely in 2018
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'
